job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Iris's </strong>client, a large Banking / Financial organization, is currently searching for a strong &lt;<strong> Data Scientist</strong> &gt; for a &lt;<strong>contract</strong> &gt; to join their team.</p><p>Our client has offices all over the world and has the global reach, advisory services and distribution power to meet the needs of issuers and investors worldwide.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Position:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data Scientist</strong></p><p><strong>Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Irving, TX / Jersey City, NJ, Mississauga</strong></p><p><strong>Duration:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Long Term</strong></p><p><strong>Required Skill:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Ability to run the query</li><li>Ability to analyze data in excel as well as through Python – dealing with large scale (5-10M+) data set</li><li>Ability to understand, collect and analyze large scale system error logs, system logs, running processes (process parameters)</li><li>Ability to understand, collect and analyze financial data and figure out missing transactional components (intelligent search) – work closely with BAs with financial knowledge, learn the business, and perform analysis</li><li>Suggest corrective actions based on AI/ML models (Automation)</li><li>Ability to use various ML modeling techniques (for ML engineers)</li><li>Have used ML for Data quality, controls, and automation</li><li>&nbsp;Please focus on quality and share good profiles irrespective of the rates</li></ul>
